node.title: 'Tragic news': Man dies in hospital after being injured during arrest in Levin
node.description: The man fell to the ground and hit his head while being arrested.
node.content: ["A man has died in Wellington Hospital after being seriously injured while getting arrested in Levin on Tuesday.\u00a0", "Police said during the arrest, the 65-year-old man and the officer fell to the ground and the man hit his head.\u00a0", "The police officer attending called for medical assistance and the man was transported to hospital.", "The man was in an induced coma but died overnight in hospital.\u00a0", "Police said they extend their sincere condolences to the man's wh\u0101nau and friends for their loss.\u00a0", "Central District Commander Superintendent Scott Fraser said that investigations into the incident are in the very early stages and police will not be making any further comment at this time.", "\"I want to express my deepest sympathies to the man's wh\u0101nau at this distressing time,\" Superintendent Fraser said. \"This is tragic news no one wants to ever hear.\"", "Police said that several investigations into the circumstances around what happened have been launched, and the Independent Police Conduct Authority has been notified.", "Police are requesting anyone who witnessed the incident, or has CCTV footage that covers Oxford Street, in the vicinity of number 47, to please get in touch via 105 and quote file number 211221/5849.\u00a0\u00a0"]
